name: Rebooting Flowers
description:
My very first game that I developped for the Ludum Dare 46 which theme was "Keep it alive".
Since it's my first project, I thought I could do way more than what I was really able to so I couldn't manage my time well and finish on time x)

That's why there not much gameplay, story, character development , environment and not even SFX or Music ^^ ; .

I still wish to develop and finish my original idea of what's this game should be in the near future so stay around if you're interested =D

The official Ludum Dare version you should rate is the V0.1.3, but I'd like if you also play the latest version (incoming soon) so you can see how the game was intended to be and also give me some feedback  so I can continue improbing the game !

V0.1.2 : First version, here only to keep it for memory's sake, considering you need to change a folder name to start the game, you should get the real Ludum Dare "Final version" V0.1.3.

V0.1.3 : Bug Fix to make the game launchable (Final Ludum Dare version)

V0.1.4 (coming soon) : Stop locking player's movement and display of Input for actions
